effect.dragonsurvival.stress.description: Applied to forest dragons who remain too long in the dark. Instantly removes all saturation, and quickly depletes hunger.
effect.dragonsurvival.trapped.descriptio: This net prevents you from escaping into the sky.
effect.dragonsurvival.fire.description: Protects cave dragons from the damaging effects of water.
effect.dragonsurvival.animal_peace.descr: Animals will not flee from dragons with this effect active.
effect.dragonsurvival.hunter.description: Forest dragons with this effect are invisible while standing in any foliage, and their first attack will deal extra damage and remove the effect.
effect.dragonsurvival.revealing_the_soul: Multiplies the experience gained from mobs.
effect.dragonsurvival.burn.description: The target takes fire damage. Damage dealt depends on the speed of the target.
effect.dragonsurvival.charged.descriptio: Produces arcs of electricity, damaging nearby mobs.
effect.dragonsurvival.drain.description: Forest dragons produce this poisonous gas. Plants will grow when exposed to their breath, while most other things will have their life drained.
effect.dragonsurvival.strong_leather.des: Grants additional armor points to all entities in an area around the dragon.
effect.dragonsurvival.wings_cave.descrip: Wings of the Cave dragon. You can change your flight toggle button in options.
effect.dragonsurvival.wings_forest.descr: Wings of the Forest dragon. You can change your flight toggle button in options.
effect.dragonsurvival.wings_sea.descript: Wings of the Sea dragon. You can change your flight toggle button in options.
effect.dragonsurvival.source_of_magic.de: Gives the dragon infinite mana to use magic.
death.attack.dragonsurvival.waterBurn.pl: %1$s tried to swim in water to escape %2$s.
death.attack.dragonsurvival.rainBurn: %1$s spent too long in the rain.
death.attack.dragonsurvival.rainBurn.pla: %1$s spent too much time in the rain trying to escape %2$s.
ds.cave_dragon_choice: In the depths of your soul, lava has begun to roar. You have chosen to become a §cCave dragon.§r
ds.forest_dragon_choice: You feel the need for raw meat, and are covered in grassy scales. You have chosen to become a §aForest dragon.§r
ds.sea_dragon_choice: The stormy sea beckons you. You have chosen to become a §3Sea dragon.§r
ds.choice_human: You have awakened from your sleep, and become a human.
ds.wings.nohunger: Hunger has exhausted you, and you can't fly.
ds.you.have.no.wings: You have §cno levitation skill§r. You need to talk to the Ender dragon, or use the Flight Grant special item.
ds.dragon.grants.wings: <Ender dragon> I bestow wings on you. Now leave, quickly!
ds.space.occupied: You need a 3x3 area to place
ds.cooldown.active: The altar is on cooldown for: %s
ds.invalid_grow_item: §6You need another type of growth artifact:§r %1$s
ds.gui.tab_button.2: If you have any questions about Dragon Survival, visit the wiki on Github!
ds.help.altar:
§6■ Welcome to Dragon Survival!§r
■ You can choose which type of dragon you want to become, each with pros and cons.§r
§r■§7 This decision is not permanent, but you may lose progress if you change your mind.§r
§r■§7 Don't forget to delete old configs if you update our mod to avoid bugs! Enjoy the game! :3
ds.help.customization:
■ You chose a dragon species! Now it's time to §6customize§r your dragon. You can select different parts, and change their color freely.

■ You can use §6Preset slots§r to save different appearances. Don't forget to apply your looks to all stages of growth!

■ If you don't know where to start, use the "§6randomize§r" button on the top right.§r

§r-§7 Shaders can affect the result. This is especially noticeable on glowing textures.§r
§r-§7 The texture from this editor is only visible if your custom skins are turned off in Skin Tab (dragon inventory). You can learn how to create your own custom skins on the Wiki or Dragon Survival discord.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.default_skin.toolti: If you are using a §6texture pack§r to test your custom skin before submitting it, check this box.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.wings.tooltip: Visual only. Not available for Western and Central body types.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.copy: Click here to copy your current settings to the other growth stages.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.save_slot: You can select any slot here and the result will be automatically saved.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.confirm.all:
With your current config settings all progress will be lost when you change species.

Would you still like to continue?
ds.gui.dragon_editor.confirm.ability:
With your current config settings your growth progress will be lost when you change species.

Would you still like to continue?
ds.gui.dragon_editor.confirm.ability_fro:
With your current config settings your growth progress will be lost when you change body type.

Would you still like to continue?
ds.gui.dragon_editor.confirm.growth:
With your current config settings your ability progress will be lost when you change species.

Would you still like to continue?
dragonsurvival:config.category.general.t: General config options for Dragon Survival
ds.endmessage.1: Have you come here for the flight spin ability, %s? You should leave, before it's too late.
ds.endmessage.2: This is my land, %s, show some respect. Why have you come here? Do you seek the flight spin ability?
ds.endmessage.3: You have gone through a lot to get here, %s. What do you wish for?
ds.altar_dragon_info.cave_dragon:
§c■ Cave dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r fire resistance, pickaxe claws, fire magic, faster movement on stone and magma blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r water.
§6■ Diet:§r
%s
ds.altar_dragon_info.forest_dragon:
§a■ Forest dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r soft fall, axe claws, poison magic, faster movement on wooden and grass blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r dark caves.
§6■ Diet:§r
%s
ds.altar_dragon_info.sea_dragon:

§2■ Features:§f§r underwater breathing, shovel claws, electric magic, faster movement on ice and beach blocks.

§6■ Diet:§r

ds.altar_dragon_info.human:
■ §nHuman.§r
■ Homo sapiens.§r
Travelers, builders, and creators.
ds.skill.help_1:
■ §6Active skills§r are used in combat.
- §9Skill power§r scales off your current experience level. The higher your EXP level, the stronger your active skills.
- §9Experience or mana§r points are used to cast spells.
- §9Controls§r - check in-game Minecraft control settings! You can drag and drop skill icons around.
ds.skill.help_1_alt:
■ §6Active skills§r are used in combat.
- §9Experience or mana§r points are used to cast spells.
- §9Controls§r - check in the game settings! You can drag and drop skill icons around.
ds.skill.help_2:
■ §aPassive skills§r are upgraded by spending experience levels.
- §9Mana§r - do not forget use the Source of Magic and Dragons Treats for an infinite supply of mana!
- §9More information§r can be found on our Wiki and in our Discord. Check the Curseforge mod page.
ds.skill.help_2_alt:
■ §aPassive skills§r can be upgraded permanently, unlike Active skills.
- §9Mana§r - do not forget to use the Source of Magic and Dragons Treats for an infinite supply of mana!
- §9More information§r can be found on our Wiki and in our Discord. Check the Curseforge mod page.
ds.skill.help_3: ■ §dInnate skills§r are a dragon's quirks, and represent the benefits and drawbacks of each dragon type.
ds.skill.help.claws:
■ A dragon is §6born§r with strong claws and teeth, but you can make them even better! Just put §6any tools§r§f here in your claw slots and your bare paw will borrow their aspect as long as they are intact.
§7■ Does not stack with «Claws and Teeth» skill, which only applies if these slots are empty.
ds.help.source_of_magic:
■ A source of magic can be charged with Elder Dragon items. 
■ Crouch + right click to use.

■ §6+10 sec§r - Elder Dragon Dust
■ §6+50 sec§r - Elder Dragon Bone
■ §6+100 sec§r - Dragon Heart Shard
■ §6+300 sec§r - Weak Dragon Heart
■ §6+1000 sec§r - Elder Dragon Heart
ds.skill.description.storm_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a stream of sparks. Targets become §c«Electrified»§r and deal electric damage to everything nearby.

■ Charges creepers, and may summon thunderbolts during a storm. 

■ Range depends on the age of the dragon.
ds.skill.description.ball_lightning:
■ Ranged attack: shoots out a condensed ball of electrical energy. Deals damage and §celectrifies§r nearby enemies as it travels.

■ During a thunderstorm, lightning may strike the ball.
ds.skill.description.revealing_the_soul:
■ AOE Buff: multiplies the amount of §2experience§r gained from monsters up to a limit. 

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.sea_eyes:
■ Personal Buff: provides §2Sea Vision§r for a short time.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.sea_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores on wet blocks.

■ Current amount of §2%s§r mana:
 - §2%s§r from «Sea Magic»
 - §2%s§r from level of dragon
 - §2%s§r body type
ds.skill.description.sea_athletics:
■ Standing on some blocks will give you §2Speed %s§r

■ Duration: §2%s§rs
ds.skill.description.water:
■ Increases your capacity for hydration while outside of water. Will help you to survive while venturing onto land, or even in the Nether.

■ Duration: §2%s§rs
ds.skill.description.spectral_impact: ■ Gives a §c%s%%§r chance to make your attack ignore enemy armor.
ds.skill.description.sea_claws_and_teeth:
■ Sea dragons §2can§r deal increased damage and can dig blocks that require shovels without tools. They grow stronger with age.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses, or use certain items.
ds.skill.description.sea_wings:
■ Dragons can use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability. Only one dragon in this world can share this power with you.

■ Enable flight: [%s]
ds.skill.description.sea_wings.has_spin: ■ You are able to §2spin§r while flying or swimming.
ds.skill.description.sea_wings.no_spin: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r while flying or swimming.
ds.skill.description.sea_dragon:
■ Sea dragons are made mostly of water, with a golden skeleton. Their diet includes a variety of seafood, and peaceful animals fear dragons.

■ They have innate immunity to lightning and §2unlimited oxygen§r§7. They feel best in the sea.§r
ds.skill.description.amphibian:
■ Drying out under the harsh sun is a major concern for sea dragons. If they are outside of the water for too long, they will dehydrate and suffer damage.

■ The skill «Water», effect «Sea Peace», rain, ice, snow and water bottles §7could make your life easier.§r

■ Damage when dehydrated: §c%s per %ss§r
ds.skill.description.poisonous_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a toxic gas that creates a §c«Drain»§r area of effect, which is deadly for creatures, but helps plants grow faster.

■ Range depends on the age of the dragon. Cannot be used while affected by «Stress»."
ds.skill.description.spike: ■ Ranged attack: shoots out sharp §cdarts§r, which fly a large distance to pierce your target. Less effective underwater.
ds.skill.description.inspiration:
■ AOE buff: provides §2Haste III§r to all nearby creatures, increasing your block harvesting speed.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.hunter:
■ Personal buff: Activates the §2Hunter§r effect, which allows you to become invisible in tall grass and increases your movement speed. Your first melee strike will remove this effect and cause a critical hit with a §c%s§r damage bonus.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight. Will be removed early if you take damage, or attack a target.
ds.skill.description.forest_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores under direct sunlight and on grass.

■ Current amount of §2%s§r mana:
 - §2%s§r from «Forest Magic»
 - §2%s§r from level of dragon
 - §2%s§r from body type
ds.skill.description.forest_athletics:
■ Standing on wooden or grassy blocks will give you §2Speed %s§r

■ Duration: §2%s§rs
ds.skill.description.light_in_darkness: ■ Allows you to stay longer in dark areas. Delay before you gain «Stress» while in low light level: §2%ss§r.
ds.skill.description.cliffhanger: Your landing becomes much softer. Safe fall distance: §2%sb§r.
ds.skill.description.forest_claws_and_te:
■ Forest dragons §2can§r deal increased damage, and may chop down trees without tools. They grow stronger with age.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses and use several items.
ds.skill.description.forest_wings:
■ Dragons can use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability. Only one dragon in this world can share this power with you.

■ Enable flight: [%s]
ds.skill.description.forest_wings.has_sp: ■ You are able to §2spin§r while flying or swimming.
ds.skill.description.forest_wings.no_spi: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r while flying or swimming.
ds.skill.description.forest_dragon:
■ Forest dragons have a diamond skeleton, and are composed mostly of predatory plants. Their diet includes raw meat and sweet berries, and most animals fear them.

■ They have innate §2immunity to thorn bushes and cacti§r§7. They feel best on the surface of the Overworld.
ds.skill.description.fear_of_dark:
■ The predatory plants in your body dislike §dDarkness§r. If the light level around you is lower than 4, you may receive the §c«Stress»§r effect, rapidly draining your food gauge.

■ The skill «Light the Dark» and effect «Forest Magic» §7could make your life easier.
ds.description.hot_dragon_rod: ■§7 Protects cave dragons from water for a short time. A blaze rod seasoned with dragon dust; a crispy snack that increases the dragon's body temperature.
ds.description.explosive_copper: ■§7 Cave dragon dessert. Dangerous and unstable.
ds.description.quartz_explosive_copper: ■§7 Removes Wither and Poison effects, gives Absorption and Regeneration. A high-pressure heated mixture of Fused Quartz and Explosive Copper.
ds.description.double_quartz: ■§7 Grants Regeneration. Quartz and Amethyst that has been combined with enough heat and force to greatly improve their flavor.
ds.description.sweet_sour_rabbit: ■§7 Cleanses all active effects. Rabbit, marinated with a mixture of honey and spider eyes. Traditionally served during dragon holidays.
ds.description.luminous_ointment: ■§7 A tincture of various glowing ingredients that protects against the darkness when consumed. Dark environments sap a forest dragon's strength as their own plants begin to devour them.
ds.description.diamond_chorus: ■§7 Removes Wither and Poison effects, and gives Absorption and Regeneration. Chorus Fruit stuffed with diamond dust. The diamonds are pulverized using the Ender Dragon's breath.
ds.description.smelly_meat_porridge: ■§7 A meat and bone fertilizer. Contains plenty of nutrients to feed a forest dragon's plants.
ds.description.meat_wild_berries: ■§7 A classic combination of sweet berries and wild herbs. A favorite amongst forest dragons.
ds.description.meat_chorus_mix: ■§7 Grants Regeneration. The exotic Chorus Fruit has always been prized among forest dragons, and is commonly combined with raw meats.
ds.description.seasoned_fish: ■§7 A popular seafood dish amongst dragons. It is prepared by removing the skin and coating it with ink. This gives it an unusual taste and hue. The kelp leaf is for decoration and freshness.
ds.description.golden_coral_pufferfish: ■§7 Grants Regeneration. Gilded pufferfish dusted with crushed coral. The gold neutralizes the natural poison of the pufferfish, making it safer for consumption.
ds.description.frozen_raw_fish: ■§7 Cleanses all effects and replenishes water. Food and water in one convenient package!
ds.description.golden_turtle_egg: ■§7 Removes Wither and Poison effects, and gives Absorption and Regeneration. A turtle egg stuffed with dragon dust and gold. After a while, the dust reacts with the eggshell, changing its color and texture.
ds.description.charred_seafood: ■§7 Stories speak of a time when someone tried to feed a cave dragon fish. This is what they got back!
ds.skill.description.nether_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a stream of fire that ignites enemies and blocks. Range depends on age of the dragon.

■ Is able to destroy some blocks. Cannot be used under water, and during rain.
ds.skill.description.fireball: ■ Ranged attack: shoots out a fireball that §cexplodes§r and sets the area on fire.
ds.skill.description.strong_leather:
■ AOE buff: provides temporarily increased §2armor§r to all nearby creatures.

■ The effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.lava_vision: ■ Personal buff: makes lava more §2transparent§r while active.
ds.skill.description.cave_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores while standing on hot blocks.

■ Current amount of §2%s§r mana:
 - §2%s§r from «Cave Magic»
 - §2%s§r from level of dragon
 - §2%s§r from body type
ds.skill.description.cave_athletics:
■ Standing on stone surfaces will give you §2Speed %s§r

■ Duration: §2%s§rs
ds.skill.description.contrast_shower:
■ You are resistant to Rain, snow and snowfall for: §2%s§rs

■ Water, potions and snowballs are still dangerous
ds.skill.description.burn:
■ Your target has a %s%% chance to receive the §c«Burned»§r effect from your attacks.

The effect deals damage when the target moves.

The faster the movement, the more damage is done.

■ Creatures with fire resistance are immune to this effect.
ds.skill.description.cave_claws_and_teet:
■ Cave dragons §2can§r deal increased damage, and may mine stone blocks without tools. This ability gets stronger as you grow.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses and use several items.
ds.skill.description.cave_wings:
■ Dragons use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability. Only one dragon in this world can share their power of flight with you.

■ Enable flight: [%s]
ds.skill.description.cave_wings.has_spin: ■ You are able to §2spin§r in air and in lava.
ds.skill.description.cave_wings.no_spin: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r in air and in lava.
ds.skill.description.cave_dragon:
■ Cave dragons have a netherite skeleton, and are made mostly of lava. Their diet includes charred meat and coal. Peaceful animals fear dragons.

■ They have innate §2immunity to fire§r and they feel best in the Nether.
ds.skill.description.hot_blood:
■ Cave dragons take §cdamage from water§r, snow, rain and other liquids due to their fiery nature.

■ The skill «Contrast Shower» and effect «Cave Fire» §7could make your life easier.

■ Damage: §c%s points in %ss§r
ds.description.caveDoor: ■§7 A large door that only a cave dragon may open.
ds.description.forestDoor: ■§7 A large door that only a forest dragon may open.
ds.description.seaDoor: ■§7 A large door that only a sea dragon may open.
ds.description.legacyDoor: ■§7 The very first large door we added to the mod. Just for nostalgia.
ds.description.grayHelmet: ■§7 Poor hunter. Fortunately, you didn't know him.
ds.description.goldHelmet: ■§7 You surely remember that the knight wore dark armor. Where did the golden helmet come from?
ds.description.blackHelmet: ■§7 You should have used the Eye of Innos.
ds.description.dragonBeacon: ■§7 Required to create dragon beacons. When you craft this item, you will keep the beacon used in its recipe.
ds.description.passivePeaceBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Sea Peace» and «Animal Calm». Best for sea dragons. Peaceful animals stop running away from the dragon. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience.
ds.description.passiveMagicBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Forest Magic» and «Haste». Best for forest dragons. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience.
ds.description.passiveFireBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Cave Fire» and «Sturdy Skin». Gives extra armor. Best for cave dragons. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience.
ds.description.dragonMemoryBlock: ■§7 If set under any dragon beacon, you will passively receive its effect in an area centered on the beacon at no additional cost, but for reduced duration. You may still activate the beacon to receive the full duration effect.
ds.description.dragonAltar: ■§7 An altar that allows you to turn into a dragon.
ds.description.elderDragonDust:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 Dust left from an ancient creature, this is used in many dragon recipes. Can be found in ore and treasure.
ds.description.elderDragonBone:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 The remains of small dragons. This is used in many dragon recipes. The dragons were created from the body of an elder creature that sacrificed itself to save the world.
ds.description.heartElement:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 A fragment from a small dragon's heart. Ideal for a newborn dragon's growth. Monsters with low health will rarely drop this when killed.
ds.description.weakDragonHeart:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 A strengthened, but still unstable Heart. Ideal for a young dragon's growth. Some monsters will rarely drop this when killed.
ds.description.elderDragonHeart:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 A heart that is radiant and full of energy. If you listen, you can hear an elder voice calling to you from the depths. Ideal for an adult dragon's growth. Monsters with a lot of health will rarely drop this when killed
ds.description.starBone: ■§7 This item slightly reverses a dragon's growth. Find the bones of dead dragons in underground tunnels.
ds.description.starHeart: ■§7 Stops gradual dragon growth permanently. Can use again to re-enable growth.
ds.description.chargedCoal: ■§7 Removes all effects. Can also be used to smelt a large number of items. More efficient than a block of coal.
ds.description.chargedSoup: ■§7 A concoction of various cave dragon delicacies. Heats up the body enough to protect it from the damaging effects of water.
ds.description.wing_grant: ■§7 This item gives your dragon the ability to fly. Consumed on use. Can also be used to remove flight.
ds.description.spin_grant: ■§7 This item gives your dragon the ability to spin while flying. Consumed on use. Can be used again to remove the ability.
ds.description.treasures: ■§7 Dragons can sleep on treasure to regenerate health and mana. Gathering more treasure increases the speed of the regeneration. Build your horde and show off your wealth!
ds.description.cave_source_of_magic: ■§7 Cave dragons can bathe here to temporarily gain infinite mana. Damages other creatures.
ds.description.forest_source_of_magic: ■§7 Forest dragons can bathe here to temporarily gain infinite mana. Damages other creatures.
ds.description.sea_source_of_magic: ■§7 Sea dragons can bathe here to temporarily gain infinite mana. Damages other creatures.
ds.description.dragon_pressure_plate: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal while any dragon stands on it. It will not activate if a human steps on it.
ds.description.cave_dragon_pressure_plat: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal while a cave dragon stands on it. Can open a cave dragon door, if adjacent to it.
ds.description.forest_dragon_pressure_pl: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal while a forest dragon stands on it. Can open a forest dragon door, if adjacent to it.
ds.description.sea_dragon_pressure_plate: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal while a sea dragon stands on it. Can open a sea dragon door, if adjacent to it.
ds.description.human_pressure_plate: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal only while a human stands on it. Will not activate for dragons.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.yours: ■ This is what §6you§r look like now.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.random: ■ Shows a randomly selected §6other player§r§f who uploaded a skin. You §ccan't use§r§f their appearance for yourself!§7 Only look and admire! >:D
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.help:
■ A §6Skin§r is a self-made texture for your dragon. In this tab, you can disable the display of your skin for your dragon at different stages, as well as skins of other players.
■ Skins are not built in the Dragon Editor, but created using outside tools.
§7■ If you are interested in how to make your own skin or take a commission, use the buttons on the right.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.discord: ■ Join our §6discord server§r!§7 Read the Rules, FAQ and Wiki before you ask anything.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.wiki: ■ This is a link to our §6Wiki§r dedicated to making your own skin!§7 Remember that this will be very difficult, and requires knowledge of graphic editors.
ds.gui.skins.noskin: This author does not have a skin for this stage.
ds.gui.skins.noskin.yours: You do not have a skin for this stage.
ds.gui.claws.rendering: Toggle showing claws and teeth textures on your model.
ds.gui.growth_help:
■ All dragons will gradually grow as time passes, improving their attributes. At certain growth stages, your appearance will change, and your growth will slow. You can use these items to speed up growth:§r
§6■ %s

§7■ A Star Bone will revert your growth slightly, and a Star Heart will completely stop you from growing. The biggest dragons can take other players for a ride!
ds.gui.body_types.center.tooltip:
§6■ Central Type§r
■ Inhabitants of all biomes, and the most common type of dragon. They are the most balanced type of dragon, having no particular strengths or weaknesses.
§7■ You may change your body type at any time, but you will lose your growth progress.
ds.gui.body_types.north.tooltip:
§6■ Northern Type§r
■ Perfect travelers, conquering water, lava and air. They are slower on the ground and weaker physically, but are magically adept and excel at swimming. Their flat bodies allow them to go places other dragons cannot.
§7■ You may change your body type at any time, but you will lose your growth progress. Each type has their own strengths and weaknesses, but the change is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.body_types.east.tooltip:
§6■ Eastern Type§r
■ Adapted to life in caves, they lack large wings, reducing the effectiveness of their levitation magic, but they are still excellent swimmers. They have a larger supply of mana, and natural armor.
§7■ You may change your body type at any time, but you will lose your growth progress.
ds.gui.body_types.south.tooltip:
§6■ Southern Type§r
■ They are adapted to life on the plains, capable of running swiftly, and leaping high into the air. The special structure of their paws gives them many advantages on the ground, and they are physically strong, but they will struggle at flight and swimming.
§7■ You may change your body type at any time, but you will lose your growth progress. Each type has their own strengths and weaknesses, but the change is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.body_types.west.tooltip:
§6■ Western Type§r
■ Conquerors of mountain and sky, they are unrivalled in their element, but are rather clumsy on the ground.
§7■ You may change your body type at any time, but you will lose your growth progress.
ds.gui.altar.can_still_use:
You didn't make your initial choice in the Dragon Altar!
You may still open the altar in your inventory.
ds.description.dragon_soul: ■§7 This vessel holds the dragon's soul. Use it to become a dragon. Replaces your current stats if you are a dragon.
ds.description.dragon_soul_empty: ■§7 An empty dragon's soul. With this item, you can store all your dragon's characteristics. After using it, you become human.
ds.description.dragon_rider_workbench: ■§7 A work station for a villager who sells useful dragon enchantments. Knows the secrets to getting into the draconic vaults.
ds.description.hunter_key: ■§7 An enchanted key that unlocks a treasure vault for dragon hunters. Can be purchased from the Hunter Leader in the Hunter Castle.
ds.description.evil_dragon_key: ■§7 An enchanted key that unlocks the Dark Vault in Nether. Drops if you kill a dragon hunter knight.
ds.description.good_dragon_key: ■§7 An enchanted key that unlocks the Light Vault. Purchased from the dragon rider villager.
ds.description.dragon_hunter_sword: ■§7 The sword of the dragon hunters. Slow, but strong. Can be found in the hunters treasury.
ds.description.good_dragon_upgrade: ■§7 A rare item that allows you to upgrade your Netherite Armor to Light Armor. The armor will have built-in enchantments to help you live peacefully in this world.
ds.description.evil_dragon_upgrade: ■§7 A rare item that allows you to upgrade your Netherite Armor to Dark Armor. The armor will have built-in enchantments to help you effectively shed blood in the name of evil.
ds.description.hunter_partisan: ■§7 A long shafted weapon designed to take out enemies at a distance. Especially good against flying dragons.
ds.description.spearman_promotion: ■ §7Use on a Hunter Spearman to turn him into a Hunter Leader.
ds.description.dragonsbane: §5Dragonsbane §8(Weapon)§r: Inflict increased damage to dragons. If you kill a dragon who has the Hunter's Omen effect, they will lose some growth progress. Damages dragons who hold it.
ds.description.blood_siphon: §4Blood Siphon §8(Head)§r: Has a chance to apply Blood Siphon to the enemy when you get hit, allowing you to recover a portion of the damage done.
ds.description.murderers_cunning: §4Murderer's Cunning §8(Chest)§r: You inflict increased damage to targets with full health.
ds.description.overwhelming_might: §4Overwhelming Might §8(Legs)§r: Debuffs you apply to targets are increased by 1 level.
ds.description.draconic_superiority: §4Draconic Superiority §8(Boots)§r: All damage you inflict is increased, and your melee damage is further increased.
ds.description.combat_recovery: §6Combat Recovery §8(Head)§r: When you take damage, has a chance to apply Regeneration to yourself.
ds.description.aerodynamic_mastery: §6Aerodynamic Mastery §8(Chest)§r: Reduces flight stamina cost, and has a chance to conserve rockets during elytra flight.
ds.description.unbreakable_spirit: §6Unbreakable Spirit §8(Legs)§r: Reduces incoming debuffs by 1 level.
ds.description.sacred_scales: §6Sacred Scales §8(Boots)§r: Has a chance to reduce incoming damage.
ds.description.curse_of_outlaw: §4Outlaw's Mark §8(Armor)§r: Causes you to be a permanent target for dragon hunters.
ds.description.curse_of_kindness: §6Mark of Compassion §8(Armor)§r: You deal reduced damage to dragon hunters and villagers.
ds.description.bolas: Bolas (Crossbow): Transforms your arrows into bolas that slow enemies down.
ds.advancements.be_dragon.title: Echoes of Elder
ds.advancements.be_dragon.description: Find the burial place of the Elder Dragon's children.
ds.advancements.collect_dust.title: Elder Dragon Lore
ds.advancements.collect_dust.description: Collect elder dragon dust by mining ore.
ds.advancements.place_altar.title: Dragon Starter Pack
ds.advancements.place_altar.description: Place a Dragon Altar to change the species or appearance of a dragon.
ds.advancements.fly_high.title: Dragon Riders
ds.advancements.fly_high.description: Take a human friend high into the skies. Crouch!
ds.advancements.sleep_on_treasure.title: Loot: The Gathering
ds.advancements.sleep_on_treasure.descri: Sleep on a pile of 10 or more treasure blocks.
ds.advancements.sleep_on_hoard.title: Finally, a Worthy Bed
ds.advancements.sleep_on_hoard.descripti: Collect yourself a truly large stash of treasure. 100 blocks will be enough
ds.advancements.sleep_on_massive_hoard.d: Build yourself a hoard of 240 treasure blocks and experience regeneration while you sleep!
ds.advancements.use_star_heart.title: Forever Young
ds.advancements.use_star_heart.descripti: Use a Star Heart to stop your growth.
ds.advancements.be_cave_dragon.title: Ab Igne Ignem
ds.advancements.be_old_cave_dragon.title: Lava Core, Netherite Hide
ds.advancements.be_old_cave_dragon.descr: Gain level 60 growth as a cave dragon.
ds.advancements.swim_in_lava.title: Floor is lava
ds.advancements.swim_in_lava.description: Swim in a deep pool of lava as cave dragon!
ds.advancements.diamonds_in_lava.title: Protected Excavations
ds.advancements.diamonds_in_lava.descrip: Find the diamonds at the bottom of the lava lake and dig them out.
ds.advancements.enter_water_safely.title: Waterproof
ds.advancements.enter_water_safely.descr: Get the water resistance effect from food or beacon and swim in the water.
ds.advancements.go_home.title: Smells like... Home
ds.advancements.go_home.description: Venture into the Nether as a cave dragon with Cave Vision.
ds.advancements.rock_eater.title: Fuel for the Fire
ds.advancements.rock_eater.description: Eat all unique cave dragon foods from Dragon Survival. You can check what foods you can eat in the dragon altar. Don't forget to try the hot dragon rod!
ds.advancements.master_all_cave_passives: Achieve total mastery of your cave dragon passive skills.
ds.advancements.be_forest_dragon.title: Ubi Mel, Ibi Apes
ds.advancements.be_forest_dragon.descrip: Become a forest dragon by any means necessary.
ds.advancements.be_old_forest_dragon.des: Gain level 60 growth as a forest dragon.
ds.advancements.stand_on_sweet_berries.d: Jump into sweet berry bushes and test the strength of your skin!
ds.advancements.prevent_darkness_penalty: Venture into the darkness, unafraid of what may happen.
Transplant a tasty purple flower back home on the Overworld.
ds.advancements.meat_eater.title: Meat Eater
ds.advancements.meat_eater.description: Eat all unique forest dragon foods from Dragon Survival. You can check what foods you can eat in the dragon altar.
ds.advancements.master_all_forest_passiv: Achieve total mastery of your forest dragon passive skills.
ds.advancements.be_sea_dragon.title: Heterochromia Iridum
ds.advancements.be_sea_dragon.descriptio: Become a sea dragon by any means necessary.
ds.advancements.be_old_sea_dragon.title: True Ancient Guardian
ds.advancements.be_old_sea_dragon.descri: Gain level 60 growth as a sea dragon.
ds.advancements.loot_shipwreck.title: Ocean Reclaimer
ds.advancements.loot_shipwreck.descripti: Claim salvage from all three types of chests in a shipwreck.
ds.advancements.rain_dancing.title: Dancing in the Rain
ds.advancements.rain_dancing.description: Feel hydration during rain and thunderstorm.
ds.advancements.sea_peace_in_nether.desc: Use a Sea Beacon's magic to enter The Nether without drying out.
ds.advancements.enter_snow_in_nether.des: Place some snow to stay hydrated in the Nether.
ds.advancements.fish_eater.title: No Rice in Sushi
ds.advancements.fish_eater.description: Eat all unique sea dragon foods from Dragon Survival. You can check what foods you can eat in the dragon altar.
Achieve total mastery of your sea dragon passive skills.
ds.advancements.collect_good_key.title: Path of Good
ds.advancements.collect_good_key.descrip: Earn a Light Key by trading with the Dragon Rider villagers.
ds.advancements.open_good_vault.title: Subterranean Reward
ds.advancements.open_good_vault.descript: Find a Light Dragon Vault, and open it using a Light Key.
ds.advancements.make_good_armor.title: Protector of the Light
ds.advancements.make_good_armor.descript: Upgrade a piece of Netherite armor to Light Dragon Armor.
ds.advancements.make_all_good_armor.desc: Put together a full set of Light Dragon Armor, and stand defiant against all who would bring you harm.
ds.advancements.collect_evil_key.title: Path of Destruction
ds.advancements.collect_evil_key.descrip: Tear a Dark Key from a hunter knight. Blood will have to be spilled.
ds.advancements.open_evil_vault.title: Bloodstained Claim
ds.advancements.open_evil_vault.descript: Follow a Dark Key to a Dark Dragon Vault, and claim your murderous prize.
ds.advancements.make_evil_armor.title: Umbral Terror
ds.advancements.make_evil_armor.descript: Upgrade a piece of Netherite armor to Dark Dragon Armor.
ds.advancements.make_all_evil_armor.desc: Put together a full set of Dark Dragon Armor, and continue your path to total conquest.
ds.advancements.get_hunter_omen.title: Marked
ds.advancements.get_hunter_omen.descript: After a lot of killing, the dragon hunters are interested in you.
ds.advancements.fear_me.title: Fear Me!
ds.advancements.fear_me.description: Coerce loot from a terrified villager, on pain of death.
ds.advancements.collect_hunter_key.title: Path of Dragon Hunter
ds.advancements.collect_hunter_key.descr: Earn a Hunter Key by cooperating with the Dragon Hunters.
ds.advancements.open_hunter_vault.title: Hunter's Bounty
ds.advancements.open_hunter_vault.descri: Follow a Hunter Key to the secret stash and liberate a Dragon Hunter Vault of its contents.
ds.advancements.hit_dragon_with_dragonsb: Give someone appropriate a smack with a legendary weapon.
ds.advancements.use_dragon_soul.title: Soul of a Dragon
ds.advancements.use_dragon_soul.descript: Use a Dragon Soul to store all your stats. You can pass it on to another player or keep it for yourself!
ds.advancements.fire_bolas.title: Trapper
ds.advancements.fire_bolas.description: Fire a crossbow with the bolas enchantment. Time to catch dragons!
ds.advancements.be_young_dragon.title: Growth Process
ds.advancements.be_young_dragon.descript: Become a young dragon using time or heart parts.
ds.advancements.be_adult_dragon.title: Older And Stronger
ds.advancements.be_adult_dragon.descript: Grow your dragon into an adult! Time to look for a player-rider.
ds.advancements.rider_workbench.title: Dragon Friends
ds.advancements.rider_workbench.descript: Create a Rider Workbench to create the new villager profession.
ds.advancements.promotion.title: Would you take a flyer?
ds.advancements.promotion.description: Find Spearman and make him an offer he can't refuse!
ds.advancements.path_choice.title: Path Choice
ds.advancements.path_choice.description: Find a villager and decide its fate.
ds.advancements.use_memory_block.title: Knowledge is Power
ds.advancements.use_memory_block.descrip: Place any Dragon Beacon on top of the Memory Block
ds.advancements.change_beacon.title: Unity of Species
ds.advancements.change_beacon.descriptio: Upgrade the Empty Dragon Beacon with Netherite ingot, Gold block or Diamond block.
ds.advancements.get_all_beacons.title: Zmei Gorynich
ds.advancements.get_all_beacons.descript: Buy all 3 effects from all Dragon Beacon's.
ds.advancements.collect_heart_from_monst: Get the Elder Dragon Heart by killing a monster with more than 50 xp.
ds.advancements.get_poison_potato.title: Excess Fertilizer
ds.advancements.get_poison_potato.descri: Use the forest dragon breath to get more poisoned potatoes from the crop fields.
ds.riding.target_not_crouching: The dragon you are trying to ride must be crouching for you to mount them.
ds.riding.target_too_small_as_human: The dragon you are riding is too young. To ride a dragon as a human, the dragon must be an adult.
ds.riding.self_too_big: You are too big to mount on this dragon. You must be at least half the size of the dragon you are trying to ride or smaller, but you are size %s and the dragon is size %s.

dragonsurvival.configuration.seaSpeedupB: The blocks sea dragons gain speed when standing on.
dragonsurvival.configuration.waterBonuse: Whether sea dragons get bonus swim speed and unlimited oxygen when in water.
dragonsurvival.configuration.forestSpeed: The blocks forest dragons gain speed when standing on.
dragonsurvival.configuration.cactiImmuni: Whether forest dragons are immune to cacti.
dragonsurvival.configuration.bushImmunit: Whether forest dragons are immune to sweet berry bushes.
dragonsurvival.configuration.fallReducti: How many blocks of fall damage is mitigated for forest dragons.
dragonsurvival.configuration.caveSpeedup: The blocks cave dragons gain speed when standing on.

dragonsurvival.configuration.fireImmunit: Whether cave dragons are immune to fire damage types.
dragonsurvival.configuration.speedupEffe: The level of the speedup effect dragons get when standing on speedup blocks.

dragonsurvival.configuration.baseBreakSp: Bonus break speed against all blocks (break speed * bonus). Only applied if the dragon is an adult.
dragonsurvival.configuration.bonusBreakS: Bonus break speed against blocks depending on the dragon type (break speed * bonus). Only applied if the dragon is an adult.
Bonus break speed against certain blocks depending on the dragon type (break speed * bonus).
dragonsurvival.configuration.bonusHarves: The additional harvest levels added when the harvest bonus is unlocked.
dragonsurvival.configuration.baseHarvest: The additional harvest level applied to when breaking any block, regardless of dragon or tool type.
dragonsurvival.configuration.clawsAreToo: Whether dragon claws can be used as tools.

dragonsurvival.configuration.youngStepHe: The step height bonus for young dragons.

dragonsurvival.configuration.youngJump.t: The jump height bonus for young dragons.

dragonsurvival.configuration.attackMod.t: Apply an attack damage modifier for dragons.
dragonsurvival.configuration.bonusesEnab: Whether bonuses are enabled for dragons.
dragonsurvival.configuration.healthMod.t: Apply a health modifier for dragons.
dragonsurvival.configuration.requireDrag: Force dragons to eat a unique diet for their type.
dragonsurvival.configuration.seaDragonFo: Items that sea dragons can eat as food. Formatting: modid:itemid:nutrition:saturation. Nutrition and saturation values are optional, and will default to the base values of the item (or 1/1) if not provided.
dragonsurvival.configuration.hurtfulToSe: Items that harm sea dragons when consumed. Formatting: modid:itemid:damage.
dragonsurvival.configuration.forestDrago: Items that forest dragons can eat as food. Formatting: modid:itemid:nutrition:saturation. Nutrition and saturation values are optional, and will default to the base values of the item (or 1/1) if not provided.
dragonsurvival.configuration.hurtfulToFo: Items that harm forest dragons when consumed. Formatting: modid:itemid:damage.
dragonsurvival.configuration.caveDragonF: Items that cave dragons can eat as food. Formatting: modid:itemid:nutrition:saturation. Nutrition and saturation values are optional, and will default to the base values of the item (or 1/1) if not provided.
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_beac: Configure the effects of dragon beacons.
dragonsurvival.configuration.fireBeaconE: Effects that fire beacons give to dragons.

dragonsurvival.configuration.peaceBeacon: Effects that peace beacons give to dragons.
dragonsurvival.configuration.temporaryEf: The duration of the effect in minutes from the beacon when using experience to get extra duration.
dragonsurvival.configuration.constantEff: The duration of the effect in seconds from the beacon from standing near it.
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_hunt: Configure the dragon hunters statistics and behavior.
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunterTrapp: The duration of the 'trapped' effect from the bolas enchantment.
dragonsurvival.configuration.spearmanBon: The bonus vertical reach of the spearman.
The bonus horizontal reach of the spearman.
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffinRang: Griffin attack range (how much the attack hitbox is expanded in all directions).
dragonsurvival.configuration.houndSlowdo: The chance the hound will slow down the player with their attack.
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusherHou: The number of hounds that will be spawned when the ambusher calls for reinforcements.
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusherSpe: The number of spearmen that will be spawned when the ambusher calls for reinforcements.
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusherAtt: The interval in ticks between the ambusher's attacks.
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusherSpa: The chance of spawning the ambusher when a spawn attempt is made.
The frequency of spawn attempts for the ambusher (in ticks).
dragonsurvival.configuration.knightShiel: The chance the knight will spawn with their shield.
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunterOmenS: Entities which give the 'Hunter Omen' status on death (in addition to villagers).
dragonsurvival.configuration.pillageXPGa: How many experience points does a villager gain each time you steal from them?
dragonsurvival.configuration.endVoidTele: Should the player be teleported to the overworld when they fall into the void in The End?
dragonsurvival.configuration.disableDrag: Should suffocation be disabled for dragon players?
dragonsurvival.configuration.debuffsUnaf: Debuffs that should not be affected by Unbreakable Spirit or Overwhelming Might.
dragonsurvival.configuration.allowDragon: Should the dragon altar be accessible from the vanilla inventory if the player has not made a choice yet?
dragonsurvival.configuration.startWithDr: Should the dragon altar interface be opened when a player first joins the world?
dragonsurvival.configuration.canMoveWhil: If you are allowed to move while casting certain skills.
dragonsurvival.configuration.canMoveInEm: If you are allowed to move while emoting.
dragonsurvival.configuration.syncClawRen: If players are allowed to hide their claws and teeth from other players. If it is important to you to see your opponent's weapon during PVP, set to false.
dragonsurvival.configuration.keepClawIte: If you keep your claw items on death.
dragonsurvival.configuration.altarCrafta: If the dragon altar is craftable.
dragonsurvival.configuration.altarUsageC: The cooldown in seconds between uses of the dragon altar.
dragonsurvival.configuration.forceStateU: Debug only config. Forces the state updating to resume on vaults always.
dragonsurvival.configuration.magic.toolt: Configure dragon magic behavior and dragon abilities.
dragonsurvival.configuration.saveAllAbil: Save All Abilities on Type Change
If all ability levels should be saved when changing dragon types.

dragonsurvival.configuration.seaDragonAb: Whether sea dragon abilities are enabled or not.

The cooldown in seconds of the ball lightning ability.
The cast time in seconds of the ball lightning ability.
The amount of damage the lightning ball ability deals. This value is multiplied by the skill level.
The mana cost for using the lightning ball ability.

The cooldown in seconds of the revealing the soul ability.
The cast time in seconds of the revealing the soul ability.
The mana cost for using the revealing The Soul ability.

The multiplier that is applied to experience with revealing the soul. The extra experience is in addition to the normal drops, so 1.0 is a 100% increase.

dragonsurvival.configuration.seaVisionDu: The duration in seconds of the sea vision effect given when the ability is used.

dragonsurvival.configuration.seaVisionMa: The mana cost for using the sea vision ability.

The mana cost for starting the storm breath ability.

The cast time in seconds of the storm breath ability.
The mana cost of sustaining the storm breath ability.
How often in seconds, mana is consumed while using storm breath.
